# title

**Instance Property**

The text to display for the item.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This string contains the item’s content and is displayed when the item is selected. Titles are used for pickers configured to display a list. They are not shown for stack and image sequence styles.

## Setting the Picker Item’s Content

- **contentImage**: The image to display for the item.
- **accessoryImage**: A small image to display next to the title string.
- **caption**: A caption for the item’s content.

items.description: The image to display for the item.
items.name: contentImage

items.description: A small image to display next to the title string.
items.name: accessoryImage

items.description: A caption for the item’s content.
items.name: caption

title: title
